Headline: Flames and black smoke pour from building near Paris opera
News Content: A large fire broke out in a building on boulevard des Capucines, near the Place de L’Opera square in central Paris on Saturday (November 20), sending clouds of smoke rising into the air. Eyewitness video from the street shows large flames pouring out of windows on a top floor of the building, and thick black smoke billowing out. “Firemen are intervening, avoid the area,” the Prefecture de Police said in a statement on Twitter. It was not immediately clear what caused the fire.
